idea:
We are Manufacturers of Stainless Steel / Carbon Steel / Alloy Steel, Pipe  Fittings, Forge Fittings, Fasteners & Flanges. Importer, Stockiest & Dealers of Stainless Steel / Carbon Steel & Alloy Steel Pipes, Sheets, Plates, Round Bars, Hexagonal Bars,  Square Bars, Coil circle, Flat, Angle, Channel, Beam, Flange Guard, Hose Clamp Etc.

We assure you that as a matter of policy we lay great stress on Customer’s satisfaction

and a total solution approach to our customer’s problems & needs. We maintain good

stock with a view to feed the urgent requirement of our benefited customers.

Needless to say that you would find our rates most reasonable and delivery on time.

We look forward to a long. Healthy & mutually beneficial business relationship.

We request you to kindly register/enlists us as your approved manufacturer/supplier and in

case there is any registration form, this may please be furnished to us for Necessary

action at our end.

In view of the above, we sincerely hope that you would favorably consider procuring your

future requirements for these items and look forward to receive your valued enquiries,

which we can assure you will receive our best & careful attention at the times.

Thanking you in anticipation of your favorable response.
name: VARDHAMAN EXPORTS

idea:
3ETMD Engineering Solutions Pvt Ltd. is a young and exuberant company having an experienced team collective experience of more the 50+ years in the Industry started in 2018. 


3ETMD are comprising group of people acting with common purpose of providing users and industry with an across the board method of providing maximum requirements which covers performance, specialising in Pharmaceutical, Hospitals, Warehousing. 


With a holistic team of engineers, technician, manager specially trained to conceptualise, design, contract, and maintain the system.
name: 3ETMD ENGINEERING SOLUTIONS PVT LTD
